title: JavaScript Level 10 â€” Objects, Maps & Frequencies
concept: Use objects as frequency maps to solve small problems.

challenges.title: Frequency of Numbers
challenges.description: Given N and N integers, print the frequency of each distinct number in increasing order of the number. Each line should contain: number count.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: N. Second line: N integers.
challenges.outputDescription: Multiple lines of 'number count' in ascending order of number.

challenges.title: Sum of Unique Elements
challenges.description: Given N and an array of N integers, compute the sum of distinct elements (each value counted only once).
challenges.inputDescription: First line: N. Second line: N integers.
challenges.outputDescription: Single integer: sum of distinct values.
